title: *Die* "Fucking. Bullshit."
body:
{{champion:236}} "report riv offensive language"
Five minutes later
{{champion:92}} "SHIT. Ha, fucked that up"
{{champion:236}} "report riv verbal abuse"

Who the fuck is so unstable that they feel the need to report someone for using "offensive language" ??
Shit, this isn't fucking CLUB PENGUIN or some shit like that.
